page.title: 04CHEDDAR SCHOOLS
page.content: In Cheddar there are three schools,the {First School,}where I go was started in 1845 in two little cottages in North Street.In 1871 our present school was built but as it got too small for all the children in the village other wooden classrooms have been added. Children start school when they are four years old and go to the Middle School when they are nine.There are 234 children in our school. {Fairlands{Middle School}was built in 1976 and children leave there when they are thirteen years old and then they go to{The Kings of Wessex Upper {School.}There are 430 children at Fairlands .There are 850 children at the Upper School and they leave when they are sixteen or eighteen years old.We like all the schools because there are lots of interesting things to do.
